metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Interactive form - To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document.

Is the form fillable? - Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators donâ€™t convert their PDFs to, interactive fillable forms. Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand r with the Fill & Sign tool. These non-interactive forms are called flat forms.

Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro) - You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or, enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms.
PDF/A Compliance - Creates the PDF so that it conforms to the selected ISO standard for long-term preservation of electronic documents.
Fill and Sign PDF Forms - You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types, f PDF forms
